data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Note that Esperanto does not have an equivalent for "a" or "an", it is just omitted. The ____ for `` the '' is `` la '' - ____! It ____ not ____ as ____ Spanish, Italian ____ French. In ____ to ____ good ____, ____ will ____ need ____. Adjectives in Esperanto end in "-a".
data.partBlankContent: Note that Esperanto does not have an equivalent for "a" or "an", it is just omitted. The wo__ for `` the '' is `` la '' - alw___! It do__ not cha___ as i_ Spanish, Italian o_ French. In or___ to ma__ good descri______, y__ will al__ need adjec_____. Adjectives in Esperanto end in "-a".
data.answer: 请注意，世界语中没有“a”或“an”的对等词，它只是被省略了。“The”的单词是“la”——永远都是!它不会像西班牙语、意大利语或法语那样改变。为了做出好的描述，你还需要形容词。世界语中的形容词以"-a"结尾。
